com.itextpdf.text.pdf.parser

Class GraphicsState

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.itextpdf.text.pdf.parser.GraphicsState

  • public class GraphicsState
extends Object
    Keeps all the parameters of the graphics state.
    Since:
    2.1.4
